short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fly through tickets by searching, copying, creating, and viewing articles from your HelpDocs account in any tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HelpDocs is hosted knowledge base software that reduces support tickets and increases customer happiness. Our Chrome extension lets you access your HelpDocs articles from anywhere, insert links with a couple clicks (in a variety of formats), and even create new articles.
